text: Ðis syndan þa landgemæru þe <licgeð> into westune.
<../images/tbar.gif>is ærest of siðriðe forda <on> mæres ford.
& swa of ðan ho westan wiððæne holanmere forð into ceoleardes beorge & of ðam beorhge in mæresdic.
& of wulfeardes þorne in þa grenandic.
Andlang þære dice in þone pytt.
& of <þam> pytte in deorwentan in þa myðan.
& of ðam <gemyðan> upp æft' treontan eft on siðriðe ford.
